script: There is a Hospital in the center of my hometown.
I visited Town Hall, which is 1 KM, West from Hospital.
High Street is a location in my home town, it is 4 KM, West from Town Hall.
Playground is a location in my home town, it is 4 KM, South from High Street.
About 1 km West of the Playground there is a Museum
And finally there is Park which is South from Museum and 2 KM from it.
Given the points of interest that I have told you about, how would I travel from Hospital to Park following those interesting points?
expected_responses:
From Hospital, go 1km West to Town Hall.
From Town Hall, go 4km West to High Street.
From High Street, go 4km South to Playground.
From Playground, go 1km West to Museum.
From Museum, go 2km South to Park.
